casebody.data:
Stark et al., Appellants, v. Arn et al., Appellees.

[Cite as Stark v. Arn (1993), 66 Ohio St.3d 354.]

(No. 93-212 Submitted April 21, 1993 Decided May 19, 1993.) Freund, Freeze & Arnold and Neil F. Freund, for appellants. Jacobson, Maynard, Tuschman & Kalur, Gregory C. Gibson and Pamela Pantages; Jenks, Surdyk & Cowdrey and Susan Blasik-Miller, for appellee Kenneth D. Arn, M.D. Bieser, Green & Landis and John F. Haviland, for appellees Steven L. Schaerer, M.D., and Dell Park Medical Group, Inc.

The motion to certify the record is allowed and the judgment of the court of appeals is reversed on authority of Rockey v. 84 Lumber Co. (1993), 66 Ohio St.3d 221, 611 N.E.2d 789.

The cause is remanded to the trial court for a new trial.

Moyer, C.J., A.W. Sweeney, Douglas, Wright, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney and Pfeifer, JJ., concur.
